Client¶

class queryset_client.Client(base_url, auth=None, strict_field=True, client=None)¶

Bases: object

request(url, method='GET')¶

base requester

  • accept format below for url.
    1. http://api.base.biz/base/v1/path/to/api/?id=1
    2. /base/v1/path/to/api/?id=1
    3. /v1/path/to/api/?id=1
    4. /path/to/api/?id=1
Parameters:
  • url (str) – target url
  • method (str) – GET or POST (default: GET)
Return type:

json
Returns:

json object
